data.name: Heavy Metal Machines
data.detailed_description:
The fast-paced, action-packed car battle you were waiting for.

The apocalypse is over and only Heavy Metal Machines remains. Welcome to a world of madness, mayhem and relentless destruction where you will put survival of the fittest to the test, decimating your enemies just to survive.

Be insane, be very, very insane! With matches of 4 vs 4 and competitors from all over the world, you will never run out of death-defying stunts. Choose your machine, pick a skin and make your own personal angel of destruction on four wheels. In this world, boldness is all that counts.

No gasoline; just pure adrenaline. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to destroy the enemy and deliver the bomb, not letting anything get in your way.

Do you have what it takes?

data.short_description: The apocalypse is over and only Heavy Metal Machines remains. . Heavy Metal Machines is a unique free multiplayer car battle MOBA with merciless explosions, weapons beyond imagination, and an endless set of customization. Play for free now!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, French, German, Spanish
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“In a world filled to the brim with MOBAs, Heavy Metal Machines puts a spin on the genre that's genuinely got me interested in it. It's free-to-play, and developer Hoplon specifically said on its steam page that it will only sell cosmetic items.”
PC Gamer

“You love MOBAs and cars? Heavy Metal Machines could scratch that itch.”
Spiele Tester

“Free to play games come in all shapes and sizes, but Heavy Metal Machines stands out as a top-down car combat game.”
Windows Central

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics HD 4000 or Nvidia GT 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.3+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or Radeon HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
